apis.name: List all active integrations
apis.description: Get a list of all active project integrations.

apis.name: Create/Edit Asana integration
apis.description: Set Asana integration for a project.

attributes.name: api_key
attributes.description: User API token. User must have access to task. All comments are attributed to this user.

attributes.name: restrict_to_branch
attributes.description: Comma-separated list of branches to be are automatically inspected. Leave blank to include all branches.

attributes.name: push_events
attributes.description: Enable notifications for push events

apis.name: Disable Asana integration
apis.description: Disable the Asana integration for a project. Integration settings are preserved.

apis.name: Get Asana integration settings
apis.description: Get Asana integration settings for a project.

apis.description: Set Assembla integration for a project.

attributes.name: bamboo_url
attributes.description: Bamboo root URL. For example, https://bamboo.example.com.

attributes.name: enable_ssl_verification
attributes.description: Enable SSL verification. Defaults to true (enabled).

attributes.name: build_key
attributes.description: Bamboo build plan key like KEY

attributes.name: username
attributes.description: A user with API access, if applicable

attributes.name: password
attributes.description: Password of the user

attributes.name: push_events
attributes.description: Enable notifications for push events

apis.name: Create/Edit Campfire integration
apis.description: Set Campfire integration for a project.

attributes.name: token
attributes.description: Campfire API token. To find it, log into Campfire and select My info.

attributes.name: subdomain
attributes.description: Campfire subdomain. Text between https:// and .campfirenow.com when you’re logged in.

attributes.name: room
attributes.description: Campfire room. The last part of the URL when you’re in a room.

attributes.name: push_events
attributes.description: Enable notifications for push events.

apis.name: Disable Campfire integration
apis.description: Disable the Campfire integration for a project. Integration settings are preserved.

apis.name: Get Campfire integration settings
apis.description: Get Campfire integration settings for a project.

apis.name: Create/Edit Datadog integration
apis.description: Set Datadog integration for a project.

attributes.name: api_key
attributes.description: API key used for authentication with Datadog.

attributes.name: api_url
attributes.description: (Advanced) The full URL for your Datadog site

attributes.name: datadog_env
attributes.description: For self-managed deployments, set the env% tag for all the data sent to Datadog.

attributes.name: datadog_service
attributes.description: Tag all data from this GitLab instance in Datadog. Useful when managing several self-managed deployments

attributes.name: datadog_site
attributes.description: The Datadog site to send data to. To send data to the EU site, use datadoghq.eu

attributes.name: datadog_tags
attributes.description: Custom tags in Datadog. Specify one tag per line in the format: key:value\nkey2:value2 (Introduced in GitLab 14.8.)

apis.name: Disable Datadog integration
apis.description: Disable the Datadog integration for a project. Integration settings are preserved.

apis.name: Create/Edit Jira integration
apis.description: Set Jira integration for a project.

attributes.name: url
attributes.description: The URL to the Jira project which is being linked to this GitLab project. For example, https://jira.example.com.

attributes.name: api_url
attributes.description: The base URL to the Jira instance API. Web URL value is used if not set. For example, https://jira-api.example.com.

attributes.name: username
attributes.description: The username of the user created to be used with GitLab/Jira.

attributes.name: password
attributes.description: The password of the user created to be used with GitLab/Jira.

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: Activates or deactivates the integration. Defaults to false (deactivated).

attributes.name: jira_issue_transition_automatic
attributes.description: Enable automatic issue transitions. Takes precedence over jira_issue_transition_id if enabled. Defaults to false

attributes.name: jira_issue_transition_id
attributes.description: The ID of one or more transitions for custom issue transitions. Ignored if jira_issue_transition_automatic is enabled. Defaults to a blank string, which disables custom transitions.

attributes.name: commit_events
attributes.description: Enable notifications for commit events

attributes.name: merge_requests_events
attributes.description: Enable notifications for merge request events

attributes.name: comment_on_event_enabled
attributes.description: Enable comments inside Jira issues on each GitLab event (commit / merge request)

apis.name: Disable Jira integration
apis.description: Disable the Jira integration for a project. Integration settings are preserved.
